insecure_set_result_implicit.name: android/app/privilege-escalation/insecure-set-result/implicit
insecure_set_result_implicit.description: Potential Access to Arbitrary Content Providers via Implicit Intent Interception

intent_redirection_basic.name: android/app/privilege-escalation/intent-redirection/basic
intent_redirection_basic.description: Intent Redirection which Leads to Unrestricted Access to Arbitrary Protected Application Components

intent_redirection_implicit.name: android/app/privilege-escalation/intent-redirection/implicit
intent_redirection_implicit.description: Intent Redirection which Leads to Unrestricted Access to Arbitrary Protected Application Components via Implicit Intent Interception

unsafe_intent_uri_basic.name: android/app/privilege-escalation/unsafe-intent-uri/basic
unsafe_intent_uri_basic.description: Access to Arbitrary Protected Application Components via WebView Intent URI Scheme.

unsafe_intent_uri_implicit.name: android/app/privilege-escalation/unsafe-intent-uri/implicit
unsafe_intent_uri_implicit.description: Access to Arbitrary Protected Application Components via WebView Intent URI Scheme and Implicit Intent Interception.

mutable_pending_intent_basic.name: android/app/privilege-escalation/mutable-pending-intent/basic
mutable_pending_intent_basic.description: Mutable Pending Intent with an Implicit Base Intent Wrapped on an Implicit Intent which Leads to Unrestricted Access to Arbitrary Protected Application Components.

mutable_pending_intent_notification.name: android/app/privilege-escalation/mutable-pending-intent/notification
mutable_pending_intent_notification.description: Mutable Pending Intent with an Implicit Base Intent Wrapped on an App's Notification which Leads to Unrestricted Access to Arbitrary Protected Application Components.

insecure_broadcast_basic.name: android/app/insecure-communication/insecure-broadcast/basic
insecure_broadcast_basic.description: Broadcast Sent on an Implicit Intent with No Protection which Leads to Broadcast Interception.

insecure_broadcast_insufficient_protecti.name: android/app/insecure-communication/insecure-broadcast/insufficient-protection
insecure_broadcast_insufficient_protecti.description: Broadcast Sent on an Implicit Intent with Insufficient Protection which Leads to Broadcast Interception.
